meanings.definition: Having very little flesh; thin and bony.
meanings.sent1: The dog was the boniest one in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She felt the boniest branches of the tree as she climbed.
meanings.sent3: The boniest cat in the house always manages to find the coziest spot.
meanings.sent4: The boniest part of the story was the unexpected twist at the end.
meanings.sent5: The boniest piece of meat was left untouched on the plate.

meanings.definition: Showing prominent bones; skeletal in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The boniest scarecrow in the field stood tall against the wind.
meanings.sent2: Her face looked boniest when she smiled, her cheekbones shining.
meanings.sent3: The boniest Halloween costume won the prize for the scariest.
meanings.sent4: The boniest shadows danced on the wall in the dim candlelight.
meanings.sent5: The boniest figure in the painting seemed to reach out from the canvas.
